attributes.action: Limit MP salaries and expenses increases to the annual increase given to public workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No wonder the British working man is taxed to death. I am sure we all want value for money and paying for fat pay rises for 700 odd dodgy deviants, who produce nothing but a very large 'carbon footprint' of hot air in the House of Commons is both immoral and undemocratic.
The long suffering citizen who vote in these lounge lizard parasites should have a right to dictate their pay. ITS A DEMOCRATIC DEMOCRACY!! So they keep annoyingly TELL us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
